Package game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    The Board is a 15x15 matrix of Squares.
    Frame
    Frame holds the 7 tiles each player has in their possession.
    Index
    An Index is a pair composed of row and column index.
    Player
    The Player is a Scrabble player with a name, score and frame.
    Pool
    The Pool holds 100 tiles initially, and players refill their frames by drawing tiles at random from the Pool.
    Square
    Each Square has an assigned multiplier and can have a Tile placed on it.
    Tile
    Each Tile has an associated type (blank or A-Z) and an assigned number of points for using it to construct a word.
    Word
    A Word is represented by a String of letters, placed on the board at a starting row and column, and with an orientation (across/down).
